name: Django Best Practices & Design Patterns Book
body:
This space has been reserved for an soon-to-be-released, awesome book on Django. Hidden secrets of Django Ninjas will be revealed. Powerful design patterns will be exposed. Incredible productivity tips will be unveiled. It will change your life!!!

Till then, the next command will take you a long, long way:

```
$ pip install Django
```

Excited already? Patience, grasshopper. All good things comes to those who can wait... till 2014 (November-ish).

Till then, remember to:

#### Keep Calm and Watch this Space!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
